tool.name: tool_6

param.name: SEEDS_ONLY
param.dialogReference:
Seeds Only

Boolean

Default: 0

Use only seed cells as starting points.

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Flow Routing Algorithm

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Deterministic 8 (D8)

[1] Multiple Flow Direction (FD8)

Default: 1

param.name: CONVERGENCE
param.dialogReference:
Convergence (FD8)

Floating point

Minimum: 0.001000

Default: 1.100000

Convergence factor for the 'Multiple Flow Direction' algorithm (after Freeman 1991)

tool.summary: This tool calculates the average flow path length starting from the seeds, that are given by the optional 'Seeds' grid and optionally from cells without upslope contributing areas (i.e. summits, ridges). Seeds will be all grid cells, that are not 'no data' values. If seeds are not given, only summits and ridges as given by the flow routing will be taken into account. Available flow routing methods are based on the 'Deterministic 8 (D8)' (Callaghan and Mark 1984) and the 'Multiple Flow Direction (FD8)' (Freeman 1991, Quinn et al. 1991) algorithms.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
